errors.error_description: The README incorrectly states that 'Python <= 3.6 is required'. This is an outdated and incorrect version constraint that will mislead users into setting up an incompatible environment.
correction_candidates: Change the note to specify 'Python >= 3.8 is required'.
Change the note to specify 'Python 3.7 is required'.
Remove the note about the Python version requirement.
Add a note that Python 2 is not supported.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the note about the Python version requirement.
